mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BADGE where BG_NUM IN (select MISSION.M_BADGE from MISSION_COMPLETE, MISSION where MISSION.M_NUM = MISSION_COMPLETE.MC_MISSION and MISSION_COMPLETE.MC_RIDER = #{rider} union SELECT COMPETITION.COMP_BADGE FROM COMPETITION_STATUS, COMPETITION where CS_CLUB=2 and CS_RANK <=4 and COMPETITION.COMP_NUM=COMPETITION_STATUS.CS_COMP)
select * from mission ORDER BY m_num
mapper.insert: insert into mission(m_num, m_badge, m_name,m_content, m_type) values(SEQ_MISSIONNUM.nextval, #{m_badge},#{m_name}, #{m_content}, #{m_type})
insert into badge(bg_num, bg_name, bg_image) values(SEQ_BADGE.nextval, #{bg_name}, #{bg_image})
mapper.select: select * from competition where (SUBSTR(comp_period,1,8)) < (select to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') from dual ) AND (SUBSTR(comp_period,9,16)) > (select to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') from dual)
select * from competition where (SUBSTR(comp_period,9,16)) < (select to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')from dual)

select * from ( select distinct COMPETITION.COMP_NUM, COMPETITION.COMP_CONTENT, COMPETITION.COMP_PERIOD, COMPETITION.COMP_IMAGE, COMPETITION.COMP_NAME from RIDING_RECORD, COMPETITION where RIDING_RECORD.RR_COMP=COMPETITION.COMP_NUM and RR_RIDER=#{rider} and RR_COMP is not null order by comp_num desc) where rownum<=3

select * from ( select distinct COMPETITION.COMP_NUM, COMPETITION.COMP_CONTENT, COMPETITION.COMP_PERIOD, COMPETITION.COMP_IMAGE, COMPETITION.COMP_NAME from RIDING_RECORD, COMPETITION where RIDING_RECORD.RR_COMP=COMPETITION.COMP_NUM and RR_RIDER=#{rider} and RR_COMP is not null order by comp_num desc) where rownum<=4
select * from ( select * from COMPETITION where to_date(SUBSTR(comp_period,9), 'YYYYMMDD') > sysdate order by comp_num desc ) where rownum<=2
select * from ( select * from COMPETITION where to_date(SUBSTR(comp_period,9), 'YYYYMMDD') < sysdate order by comp_num desc ) where rownum<=2
select * from COMPETITION, COURSE, BADGE where COMPETITION.COMP_COURSE = c_num and COMPETITION.COMP_BADGE=BADGE.BG_NUM and comp_num=#{comp_num}
select a.*, b.bg_image m_img, b.bg_name from mission a, badge b where a.m_badge=b.bg_num and m_num=#{m_num}

select r_nickname nickname, r_image user_img, C.bg_image bg_img from rider, ( select mc_rider, b.bg_image from mission_complete A, ( select m_num, bg_image from mission, badge where mission.m_badge=badge.bg_num) B where a.mc_mission=B.m_num and a.mc_mission = #{m_num} ) C where r_id=c.mc_rider

select sq1.*, bg_image m_img from ( select s1.*, s2.cnt from ( select * from mission where not exists ( select mc_mission from mission_complete where mc_rider=#{rider} and mc_mission=m_num) ) s1, ( select m_num, count(mc_num) cnt from mission,mission_complete where m_num=mc_mission(+) group by m_num ) s2 where s1.m_num=s2.m_num ) sq1, badge where badge.bg_num=m_badge
